    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static int correct
      instance variable, integer correct keeps track of the correct guesses to let the user know if they win
      private javax.swing.JLabel gLabel
      instance variable, gLabel is a Label on which the hangman is drawn
      private java.awt.image.BufferedImage hg1
      instance variable, hg1 is the image if the hangman that gets updated each time the user has a wrong guess
      private static int j
      instance variable, integer j keeps track of the wrong guesses
      private javax.swing.JLabel lives
      instance variable, JLabel lives prints the number of wrong guesses left for the user to make and the number of wrong guesses made so far
      private java.lang.String wGuesses
      instance variable, String wGuesses shows the user what wrong characters they have guessed so far
      private java.lang.String word
      instance variable, word is the hidden word in the game
      private javax.swing.JTable wordTable
      instance variable, wordTable is a table that contains places for the letter to be compared with the actual word in the game
      private javax.swing.JLabel wrongGuesses
      instance variable, JLabel wrongGuesses is a label containing the wrong guesses the user has made

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> checkLetter​(java.lang.Character guess)
      function compares the letter given to it to the actual word
      private static java.awt.image.BufferedImage LoadImage​(java.lang.String FileName)
      Loads an image and stores it as a buffered image
      private static void Paint​(java.awt.Graphics g, java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, double x)
      Note: function copied from my ^^image rotator program^^ in this case I don't need to rotate the image rotates an image by x degrees and draws it to the screen
      private void paintHangMan()
      function paints the hangman on the screen and terminates the program once six wrong guesses have been made
      private void paintWonMessage()
      function paints winning message to screen or an error message in case it cannot open the image file no input, it load a certain image no output, result is printed to screen
      void setupProgram()
      function adds a textfield for user to enter letters also loads the hangman picture and updates it each time user enters a wrong guess
